sub_title: President/Managing Director EMEA at KYOCERA SENCO
summary:
Transformational Senior Leader with strong track record of success in consumer goods industries. Over 25 years of building and optimizing distribution networks across EMEA for A-brands including Pentax, Stanley, Black & Decker, Dewalt, Facom and Senco. Visionary and strategic approach to leadership with tenured experience to driving strong sales growth and maximizing profitability and productivity. Fluent in multiple languages. Passionate about talent management. At ease working in different business cultures.

Leadership Expertise:
- Executive Team Leadership
- Change Management 
- Building Client & Strategic Key Account Relationships
- Marketing & Sales Leadership
- P&L Balance Sheet Ownership

profile_positions.description:
Kyocera Senco Industrial Tools is a designer, manufacturer and distributor of fastening solutions, fasteners and tools for the powered fastening industry segment in the global building, residential, industrial and commercial construction markets. Headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio (USA), Kyocera Senco Industrial Tools is part of the Kyocera Corporation, a Japanese multinational ceramics and electronics manufacturer headquartered in Kyoto (JAPAN) - Consolidated Net Sales totalling approx. €11Billion.
I’ve joined Kyocera Senco Industrial as head of the EMEA organization based out of Lelystad (NL) with full P&L responsibility for our European organization and responsible for all sales and marketing activities, as well as technical service, after-sales support and operations. 
The group has been rapidly expanding its market presence both through organic growth as well as through various recent acquisitions thereby creating the need to integrate, fine-tune and optimize these organizations across Europe allowing Kyocera-Senco to further expand the business in a profitable way. Kyocera Senco has offices in the Netherlands (HQ), Belgium, Germany, Great Britain, Turkey, Switzerland, France, Sweden, Finland, Estonia, Austria, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary and Slovenia.
Pre-integration GSV was falling and EBIT amounted to low single digit %, 18 months later the business is growing double-digit again and the EBIT sits at low double digit % level.
profile_positions.title: President/Managing Director EMEA

Stanley, Dewalt, Black+Decker, Bostitch, Facom, Irwin & Lenox in 15 markets.

Optimize Route-To-Market, both traditional as well as digital.
Investing in eCommerce / Multi-Channel.
